wobani.resources.audio

Class AudioSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.resources.audio.AudioSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource

    public class AudioSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resource
    Audio sources can emit sound effect through the connected audio buffers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      The audio source's possible states.

      • isDataRelativeToTheListener

        public boolean isDataRelativeToTheListener()
        Returns whether the audio source's position, velocity and direction is relative to the audio listener.
        Returns:
        true if the audio source's position, velocity and direction is relative to the audio listener, false if they are absolute
